children.value:
The Aquaculture (Farmed) BUL tables are broken up into supply chain
roles: Processor, Farm, Hatchery, and Feed. Because of space
limitations, they are broken up by: KDE Definition, Data Format,
Standards Data List and Standards Organization, and List Link,
Authoritative Data Source, and Authoritative Data Document.

properties.aria-label: table 4 aquaculture processor kde definition data format standard data list and standards organization permalink

children.value: Table 4: Aquaculture Processor KDE Definition, Data Format, Standard Data List, and Standards Organization

KDE# KDE Name Definition Data Format Standard Data List Standards Org
1 Species Scientific (latin) name of the seafood. To be completed in conjunction with WG2 ASFIS List of Species for Fishery Statistics Purposes FAO Fisheries and Aquaculture Statistics and Information Branch (FIAS)
2 Product Form Commercial short-hand reference of the degree of transformation of seafood from its original living form. To be completed in conjunction with WG2 Free-entry Field N / A
(GDST could author a list)
3 Production date Calendar date of last point of processing or packaging. To be completed in conjunction with WG2 ISO Date and time format International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
KDE# KDE Name Definition Data Format Standard Data List Standards Org
4 Processor Linking KDE Identifier associated with physical product marking a particular instance of seafood material such as a batch number, purchase order, or container number To be completed in conjunction with WG2 Free-entry Field N / A
(Individual facility / supply chain actor in most cases)
5 Processor Name Business name of entity that last transformed the product into semi-processed, processed or end product To be completed in conjunction with WG2 Latin Alphabet, numbers and punctuation - ISO 7-bit coded character set for information interchange (ISO/IEC 646:1991)
"https://www.iso.org/standard/4777.html?browse=tc

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO/IEC_646"		 International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
6 Processor ID/License Unique indicator generated by the authorities in the country of operation that gives the processor the license to operate. Free-entry field No standard list National or local-level authorization.
7 Product Origin Country where seafood underwent the last substantial transformation. To be completed in conjunction with WG2 ISO 2-letter country code list - ISO 3166 International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
KDE# KDE Name Definition Data Format Standard Data List Standards Org
8 Weight / Quantity Numerically quantifiable amount of seafood with a standard Unit of Measure. To be completed in conjunction with WG2 Recommendation No. 20, Codes for Units of Measure Used in International Trade UN Centre for Trade Facilitation and E-business (UN/CEFACT)
9 Units of Measure Standard for measurement of the product To be completed in conjunction with WG2 Recommendation No. 20, Codes for Units of Measure Used in International Trade UN Centre for Trade Facilitation and E-business (UN/CEFACT)
10 Item / SKU / UPC / GTIN Identifier of seafood material to distinguish it within a particular facility, company, or globally. To be completed in conjunction with WG2 Free-entry Field N / A
(No single source exists)
11 Farm Name Business name under which the farm is licensed to operate. To be completed in conjunction with WG2 Latin Alphabet, numbers and punctuation - ISO 7-bit coded character set for information interchange (ISO/IEC 646:1991)
"https://www.iso.org/standard/4777.html?browse=tc
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO/IEC_646"		 International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
12 Farm ID Unique indicator generated by the authorities in the country of operation that gives the farm the license to operate. Free-entry field No standard list National or local-level authorization.
KDE# KDE Name Definition Data Format Standard Data List Standards Org
13 Farm Country Country of farm operations ISO 2-letter country code list - ISO 3166 ISO 2-letter country code list - ISO 3166 International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
14 Farm Location GPS coordinates of farm To be completed in conjunction with WG2 GPS Coordinates according to ISO's Standard representation of geographic point location by coordinates GPS Coordinates - International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
15 Aggregator Name The name of the company or person collecting harvest from multiple farms in order to distribute to an entity down the supply chain To be completed in conjunction with WG2 Latin Alphabet, numbers and punctuation - ISO 7-bit coded character set for information interchange (ISO/IEC 646:1991)
"https://www.iso.org/standard/4777.html?browse=tc
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO/IEC_646"		 International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
16 Aggregator ID/License Unique indicator generated by the authorities in the country of operation that gives the aggregator the license to operate. Free-entry field No standard list National or local-level authorization.
17 Certification name of standards body which a particular seafood is subject to and the unique identifier associated with the certified entity. Free-entry Field N / A N / A
KDE# KDE Name Definition Data Format Standard Data List Standards Org
18 Chain of Custody name of chain of custody standards body which particular seafood is subject to and the unique identifier associated with the certified entity. Free-entry Field N / A N / A

properties.aria-label: table 5 aquaculture processor listreference link authoritative data source and authoritative data document permalink

children.value: Table 5: Aquaculture Processor List/Reference Link, Authoritative Data Source, and Authoritative Data Document

KDE# KDE Name List/reference Link Authoritative Data Source Authoritative Data Document
1 Species http://www.fao.org/cwp-on-fishery-statistics/handbook/general-concepts/identifiers-for-aquatic-animals-and-plants/en/ Farm Supervisor/Owner Farm Harvest record
2 Product Form N / A Person within a production or processing facility with the responsibility of accurately recording the product transformation Production / processing records
3 Production date https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601		 Person within a production or processing facility with the responsibility of accurately recording the date(s) of production Production / processing records
4 Processor Linking KDE N / A Person at a scale, on a production line or other place with the responsibility of recording an reference number linking the product to the last CTE Weight ticket, production records, packing lists, purchase order, container number, etc.
5 Processor Name N/A Food Processing Regulatory Authority Registry of Authorized Food Processing Facilities
6 Processor ID/License National or local-level lists. Decision from TG to request authorized sources to make lists accessible online for verification purposes - Q46 Food Processing Regulatory Authority Registry of Authorized Food Processing Facilities
7 Product Origin https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html

https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search		 Customs authority of the relevant exporting or production country Certificate(s) of origin from relevant customs authority
KDE# KDE Name List/reference Link Authoritative Data Source Authoritative Data Document
8 Weight / Quantity http://tfig.unece.org/contents/recommendation-20.htm

http://www.unece.org/cefact/codesfortrade/codes_index.html		 Person at a scale, on a production line or other place with the responsibility of recording an accurate weight of the product Weight ticket, production records, packing lists etc.
9 Units of Measure https://www.bipm.org/utils/common/pdf/si_brochure_8_en.pdf Person at a scale, on a production line or other place with the responsibility of recording an accurate weight of the product Weight ticket, production records, packing lists etc.
10 Item / SKU / UPC / GTIN N / A Person at a scale, on a production line or other place with the responsibility of recording an accurate weight of the product Weight ticket, production records, packing lists etc.
11 Farm Name N/A Aquaculture Regulatory Authority - assuming it is indicated on those records Aquaculture business public register
12 Farm ID National or local-level lists Aquaculture Regulatory Authority Aquaculture business public register
13 Farm Country https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html

https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search		 Aquaculture Regulatory Authority Aquaculture business public register
14 Farm Location GPS Coordinates - https://www.iso.org/standard/39242.html
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_6709		 Aquaculture Regulatory Authority Farm construction records / GPS device readout
15 Aggregator Name N/A Business Regulatory Authority Aquaculture business public register
16 Aggregator ID/License National or local-level lists Business Regulatory Authority Aquaculture business public register
KDE# KDE Name List/reference Link Authoritative Data Source Authoritative Data Document
17 Certification N / A Standards body which holds the intellectual property of the standard and is responsible for its revision Respective registry of the standards body
18 Chain of Custody N / A Standards body which holds the intellectual property of the standard and is responsible for its revision Respective registry of the standards body

properties.aria-label: table 6 aquaculture farm kde definition data format standard data list and standards organization permalink

children.value: Table 6: Aquaculture Farm KDE Definition, Data Format, Standard Data List, and Standards Organization

KDE # KDE Name Definition Data Format Standard Data List Standards Org
A1 Farm Site Name Individual growing area to which a specific license appls; will be comprised of several ponds, pens, tanks Latin Alphabet, numbers and punctuation - ISO 7-bit coded character set for information interchange (ISO/IEC 646:1991)https://www.iso.org/standard/4777.html?browse=tc No standard data list International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
A2 Date of Harvest Calendar date on which the seafood was harvested from the farm/cultivation area To be completed in conjunction with WG2 ISO Date and time format (ISO 8601 International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
A3 Farming method A combination of type of culture, unit, level of intensity, culture species and scale or size of exploitation as defined by the FAO.
http://www.fao.org/docrep/t8598e/t8598e05.htm		 Free-entry field FAO's Aquaculture Methods and Practices or EU's Common Fisheries Policy, AquacultureMethods FAO or EU (GDST could author a list)
A4 Feed Manufacturer Name of feed manufacturer including in-house sources Latin Alphabet, numbers and punctuation - ISO 7-bit coded character set for information interchange (ISO/IEC 646:1991)https://www.iso.org/standard/4777.html?browse=tc No standard data list International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
KDE # KDE Name Definition Data Format Standard Data List Standards Org
A5 Hatchery Name Name of company that supplied the fry/fingerlings to farm for grow out, including in-house sourced Latin Alphabet, numbers and punctuation - ISO 7-bit coded character set for information interchange (ISO/IEC 646:1991)https://www.iso.org/standard/4777.html?browse=tc No standard data list International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
A6 Hatchery ID Unique indicator generated by the authorities in the country of operation that gives the hatchery the license to operate. Free-entry field No standard list National or local-level authorization.
A7 Farm Linking KDE Identifier associated with physical product marking a particular instance of seafood material such as a batch number, purchase order, or container number To be completed in conjunction with WG2 Free-entry Field N / A
(Individual facility / supply chain actor in most cases)
A8 Certification name of standards body which a particular seafood is subject to and the unique identifier associated with the certified entity. Free-entry Field N / A N / A
A9 Chain of Custody name of chain of custody standards body which particular seafood is subject to and the unique identifier associated with the certified entity. Free-entry Field N / A N / A

properties.aria-label: table 8 aquaculture hatchery kde definition data format standard data list and standards organization permalink

children.value: Table 8: Aquaculture Hatchery KDE Definition, Data Format, Standard Data List, and Standards Organization

KDE # KDE Name Definitions Data Format Standard Data List Standards Org
B1 Species Scientific (latin) name of the seafood. To be completed in conjunction with WG2 ASFIS List of Species for Fishery Statistics Purposes FAO Fisheries and Aquaculture Statistics and Information Branch (FIAS)
B2 Hatchery name Name of company that supplied the fry/fingerlings to farm for grow out, including in-house sourced Latin Alphabet, numbers and punctuation - ISO 7-bit coded character set for information interchange (ISO/IEC 646:1991) https://www.iso.org/standard/4777.html?browse=tc No standard data list International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
B3 Hatchery ID Unique indicator generated by the authorities in the country of operation that gives the hatchery the license to operate. Free-entry field No standard list National or local-level authorization.
B4 Hatchery country Country where the hatchery is operating ISO 2-letter country code list - ISO 3166 ISO 2-letter country code list - ISO 3166 International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
B5 Hatchery location GPS coordinates of the hatchery that supplied the fry/fingerlings To be completed in conjunction with WG2 GPS Coordinates according to ISO's Standard representation of geographic point location by coordinates GPS Coordinates - International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
KDE # KDE Name Definitions Data Format Standard Data List Standards Org
B6 Harvest date per tank Date on which fingerlngs were transferred to the grow out farm/pond ISO Date and time format (ISO 8601 N/A International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
B7 Source of broodstock Broodstock from grow-out farms or taken from the wild Free entry format Broodstock are either produced domestically or sourced from the wild. Unless there is a need for more granularity in the describing the sources of broodstock, we recommend 'domestic' or 'wild sourced' are the data options N/A
B8 Hatchery Linking KDE Identifier associated with physical product marking a particular instance of seafood material such as a batch number, purchase order, or container number To be completed in conjunction with WG2 Free-entry Field N / A
(Individual facility / supply chain actor in most cases)
B9 Hatchery Certification name of standards body which a particular seafood is subject to and the unique identifier associated with the certified entity. Free-entry Field N / A N / A
B10 Hatchery Certification Chain of Custody name of chain of custody standards body which particular seafood is subject to and the unique identifier associated with the certified entity. Free-entry Field N / A N / A

properties.aria-label: table 9 aquaculture hatchery list link authoritative data source and authoritative data document permalink

children.value: Table 9: Aquaculture Hatchery List Link, Authoritative Data Source, and Authoritative Data Document

KDE # KDE Name List Link Authoritative Data Source Authoritative Data Document
B1 Species http://www.fao.org/cwp-on-fishery-statistics/handbook/general-concepts/identifiers-for-aquatic-animals-and-plants/en/ Hatchery Supervisor/Owner Hatchery Harvest record
B2 Hatchery name N/A Aquaculture Regulatory Authority Aquaculture business public register
B3 Hatchery ID National or local-level lists. Aquaculture Regulatory Authority Aquaculture business public register
B4 Hatchery country https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html

https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search		 Aquaculture Regulatory Authority Aquaculture business public register
B5 Hatchery location GPS Coordinates - https://www.iso.org/standard/39242.html

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_6709		 Possibly regulatory authority if included on Hatchery registration record Feedmill construction records / GPS device readout
KDE # KDE Name List Link Authoritative Data Source Authoritative Data Document
B6 Harvest date per tank https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html Hatchery Supervisor/Owner Harvest record
B7 Source of broodstock N/A Broodstock seller Sales record of broodstock
B8 Hatchery Linking KDE N/A Person at a scale, on a production line or other place with the responsibility of recording an reference number linking the product to a batch Weight ticket, production records, packing lists, purchase order, container number, etc.
B9 Hatchery Certification N / A Standards body which holds the intellectual property of the standard and is responsible for its revision Respective registry of the standards body
B10 Hatchery Certification Chain of Custody N / A Standards body which holds the intellectual property of the standard and is responsible for its revision Respective registry of the standards body

properties.aria-label: table 10 aquaculture feed kde definition data format standard data list and standards organization permalink

children.value: Table 10: Aquaculture Feed KDE Definition, Data Format, Standard Data List, and Standards Organization

KDE # KDE Name Definitions Data Format Standard Data List Standards Org
C1 Feed Manufacturer Name of feed manufacturer including in-house sources To be completed in conjunction with WG2 Latin Alphabet, numbers and punctuation - ISO 7-bit coded character set for information interchange (ISO/IEC 646:1991)https://www.iso.org/standard/4777.html?browse=tc International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
C2 Feedmill name Business name of entity that last transformed the feed into end product To be completed in conjunction with WG2 Latin Alphabet, numbers and punctuation - ISO 7-bit coded character set for information interchange (ISO/IEC 646:1991)https://www.iso.org/standard/4777.html?browse=tc International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
C3 Feedmill ID Unique indicator generated by the authorities in the country of operation that gives the feedmill the license to operate. Free-entry field No standard list National or local-level authorization.
C4 Feedmill Location GPS Coordinates of feedmill where feeds were manufactured To be completed in conjunction with WG2 GPS Coordinates according to ISO's Standard representation of geographic point location by coordinates GPS Coordinates - International Organization for Standardization (ISO)
C7 Source of protein source(s) of protein in formulation of feed used Latin Alphabet, numbers and punctuation - ISO 7-bit coded character set for information interchange (ISO/IEC 646:1991)https://www.iso.org/standard/4777.html?browse=tc - Wild caught
- aquaculture
- mix aqua/wild
- Farmed GMO
- Farmed non-GMO
- Mix Aqua/non-GMO
- Mix Aqua/GMO		 N/A
KDE # KDE Name Definitions Data Format Standard Data List Standards Org
C8 Feed Linking KDE Identifier associated with physical product marking a particular instance of seafood material such as a batch number, purchase order, or container number To be completed in conjunction with WG2 Free-entry Field N / A
(Individual facility / supply chain actor in most cases)
C9 Certification name of harvest standards body which the source(s) of protein used in the feed is subject to and the unique identifier associated with the certified entity. Free-entry Field N / A N / A
C10 Certification Chain of Custody name of chain of custody standards body which particular harvest seafood is subject to and the unique identifier associated with the certified entity. Free-entry Field N / A N / A

properties.aria-label: table 11 aquaculture feed list link authoritative data source and authoritative data document permalink

children.value: Table 11: Aquaculture Feed List Link Authoritative Data Source, and Authoritative Data Document

KDE # KDE Name List Link Authoritative Data Source Authoritative Data Document
C1 Feed Manufacturer N/A Aquaculture/Animal Feed Authority for feed manufacturers and for in-house sources if an approval system exists Public register of feedmills/farm feed documents for in-house feeds
C2 Feedmill name N/A Aquaculture/Animal Feed Authority Public register of feedmills
C3 Feedmill ID National or local-level lists Aquaculture/Animal Feed Authority Public register of feedmills
C4 Feedmill Location GPS Coordinates - https://www.iso.org/standard/39242.html
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_6709		 Feedmill supervisor/owner (Possibly regulatory authority if they included GPS coordinates) Feedmill construction records / GPS device readout
KDE # KDE Name List Link Authoritative Data Source Authoritative Data Document
C7 Source of protein N/A Feedmill supervisor/owner Feeds ingredients list/ Certificate of origin of wild caught byproduct /sales order/delivery order
C8 Feed Linking KDE N / A Person at a scale, on a production line or other place with the responsibility of recording a reference number linking the product to a batch Weight ticket, production records, packing lists, purchase order, container number, etc.
C9 Certification N / A Standards body which holds the intellectual property of the standard and is responsible for its revision Respective registry of the standards body
C10 Certification Chain of Custody N / A Standards body which holds the intellectual property of the standard and is responsible for its revision Respective registry of the standards body
